name: Vortioxetine
summary: Vortioxetine is an antidepressant used to treat major depressive disorder in adults, with multimodal activity affecting serotonin receptors and reuptake.
description: Vortioxetine, marketed under the brand name Trintellix (formerly Brintellix in some regions), is a multimodal antidepressant indicated for the treatment of major depressive disorder (MDD) in adults. It works through a combination of serotonin transporter inhibition and modulation of multiple serotonin (5-HT) receptor subtypes. This dual action is thought to contribute to improvements in mood, cognition, and overall depressive symptoms.

contraindications: Concurrent or recent use of MAOIs
Hypersensitivity to vortioxetine or formulation components
monitoring_required: Mood and suicidality, especially during initiation

items: Treatment of major depressive disorder in adults

sections.text: Inhibits the serotonin transporter (SERT) and modulates multiple 5-HT receptor subtypes (5-HT1A agonist, 5-HT1B partial agonist, 5-HT1D, 5-HT3, and 5-HT7 antagonist), enhancing serotonergic neurotransmission and potentially improving mood and cognitive function.

adult.oral: Start at 10 mg once daily; may increase to 20 mg once daily as tolerated. Reduce to 5 mg daily if not tolerated.

sections.text: Some improvement may be seen within 1–2 weeks, but full therapeutic effects often require 4–6 weeks.

serious: increased suicidal thoughts in young adults

other: Risk of serotonin syndrome when combined with other serotonergic drugs
May increase suicidal thoughts in young adults and adolescents
Can cause hyponatremia, particularly in elderly patients
Taper gradually to avoid discontinuation symptoms

items.action: Contraindicated; allow at least 14 days between use

sections.pregnancy: Limited data; use only if benefit justifies risk
sections.lactation: Unknown excretion in human milk; weigh benefits and risks
sections.geriatrics: Generally well tolerated; monitor for hyponatremia

sections.text: Gradually reduce dose over at least 1–2 weeks to minimize risk of withdrawal symptoms.

items: Multimodal mechanism may contribute to cognitive benefits in MDD
Less likely to cause sexual dysfunction compared to some SSRIs, but still possible
Not associated with significant weight gain in most patients

seo.title: Vortioxetine (Trintellix) - Uses, Dosage, Side Effects, and Warnings
seo.description: Vortioxetine (Trintellix) is an antidepressant for major depressive disorder. Learn about its dosing, side effects, interactions, and monitoring.
